attributes.action: Raise awareness and ensure the safe release of British ISIS hostage John Cantlie
attributes.additional_details: Information on John may be found at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Cantlie and there is a twitter page @CantlieUK.  There is also an international petition for those outside the UK at http://tinyurl.com/ktjf313
attributes.background: John Cantlie is a British photo-journalist held captive by ISIS for over three years.  He has been used in the "Lend Me your Ears" proganda videos directed and filmed by ISIS.
